<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">[Summon Lesser Servitor](/Spells.aspx?ID=1010)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 134 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) The summon lesser servitor spell cannot be used to summon imps._

**Tradition**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Three Actions" /></row>
<row>[material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

While deities jealously guard their most powerful servants from the summoning spells of those who aren't steeped in the faith, this spell allows you to conjure an inhabitant of the [Outer Sphere](/Rules.aspx?ID=308) with or without the deity's permission. You summon a [celestial](/Traits.aspx?ID=23), [monitor](/Traits.aspx?ID=111), or [fiend](/Traits.aspx?ID=70) whose level is –1 to fight on your behalf. Alternatively, you can choose a magical animal from the Outer Sphere as your lesser servitor. This animal is your choice of an [eagle](/Monsters.aspx?ID=172), [guard dog](/Monsters.aspx?ID=124), or [raven](/Monsters.aspx?ID=781). It gains the alignment matching your deity (or you, if you don't have a deity) and has the following trait depending on the alignment it gained: celestial for lawful, monitor for neutral, or fiend for evil.

 You can't summon a creature if it is opposed to your deity's alignment on either axis (or opposed to your alignment if you don't follow a deity). For example, if you deity is lawful good, you can't summon a chaotic or evil creature. The GM might determine that deities restrict specific types of creatures even if their alignments aren't diametrically opposed. For example, [Pharasma](/Deities.aspx?ID=14) would restrict the summoning of [sahkils](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=208).

 Heightening the spell increases the maximum level of creature you can summon and might add additional animal servitors, which otherwise work like the eagle, guard dog, and raven.

---
**Heightened (2nd)** Level 1.

**Heightened (3rd)** Level 2. You can summon a [black bear](/Monsters.aspx?ID=566), [giant bat](/Monsters.aspx?ID=46), or [leopard](/Monsters.aspx?ID=67).

**Heightened (4th)** Level 3. You can summon a [great white shark](/Monsters.aspx?ID=365) or [tiger](/Monsters.aspx?ID=69).
name: Summon Lesser Servitor
